mapper.select: SELECT m.material_id AS materialId, m.material_name AS materialName, c.category_name AS categoryName, m.is_expensive AS isExpensive, m.sn_code AS snCode, m.quantity AS quantity, m.usage_limit AS usageLimit, m.status AS status FROM tb_material m LEFT JOIN tb_material_category c ON m.category_id = c.category_id

SELECT m.material_id AS materialId, m.material_name AS materialName, c.category_name AS categoryName, m.is_expensive AS isExpensive, m.sn_code AS snCode, m.quantity AS quantity, m.usage_limit AS usageLimit, m.status AS status FROM tb_material m LEFT JOIN tb_material_category c ON m.category_id = c.category_id WHERE m.sn_code = #{snCode}
